name: Beherit
description: Beherits[expl 1] (ベヘリット; Dark Horse: Behelits), also referred to as 異界への呼び水 (literally 'primed droplets connecting to the beyond'), are highly spiritual stone objects that act as keys that link a deep layer of the Astral World to the Physical World. It is said that they govern the fate of humanity.

name: Beserker Armor
description: The Berserker Armor is a suit of highly durable body armor currently worn by Guts. Wearers of the armor are aptly named 'berserkers', due to the superhuman strength and inhuman ferocity they are bestowed.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: The Dragon Slayer is the massive sword Guts has wielded as his signature weapon since surviving the Eclipse.

name: Skull Knight's Sword
description: The Skull Knight's sword is a thorned sword wielded by the Skull Knight against inhumans, namely apostles and God Hand members. The Skull Knight is capable of coating the sword in a molten mass of ingested beherits stored within him, forming the Sword of Beherits
